content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light hovering over the water near the beach at great highway and fulton street in san francisco.  it was there for about one minute then slowing turned and then disappeared quickly into the sky.
content.summary: Bridge light hovering over water.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the movies with my girlfriend, on our drive heading east bound on naamans creek rd. i noticed this object with three(3) very bright lights that was hovering over the road. i noticed the object quite a ways out but only noticed that somthing was strong when we got close, and said to my girlfriend "do you see that?", she replied "yes what is that a plane?". once we got closer, i noticed none of the flashing lights that planes or helicopters have when flying. i must note, that we live near philadelphia pa, which has a large airport; during the sighting i noticed planes very far out and very high in altitude and could easily spot there flashing lights. the three lights were so bright that i could not make out what the objects shape was; but it looked like the lights were wrapping around the object so there could have been more on the other side. when i say bright, i'm not talking about the type of brightness that is shinning and is hard to look at, i'm talking about brightness that had no direction; if that makes any sense. the object was just hovering and moving west very slowly. the object was only 150-200 feet off the ground. when we got near i noticed that it was not over the road, but that it was over some land just north of the road, i also noticed that i heard no sound (my window was down). i kept asking my girlfriend if she could see anything i couldn't, she would reply "i don't know what that is". we got so close to it that she could not see because it was about to be above us and to the left of us and she needed to watch the road. i leaned forward trying to look up and left through the windshield and still could only see three bright lights just before we drove under it. once we drove under it i could no longer see it. we drive back and forth on naamans creek rd. at night frequently, and we have never noticed it again.

as for my feelings, i didn't feel fear or anything that made me want to get the heck out of there. i was so surprised to see this that i didn't have time to think about anything else except of what i was actually seeing. after we lost sight of the object, i looked to my girlfriend who was driving, and just said to her "there's no chance that it could have been a plane or helicopter right?". she replied " i was only able to look every few seconds, and i didn't see the flashing lights that planes have"
content.summary: Object was low and hovering, could not see the structure, only the very bright. lights

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in backyard and noticed them changing altitude rapidly and a few minutes later dissapeared instantly
content.summary: 4 lights moving around then dissapeared quickly

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving  west-bound on 90 just before the tollbooth when my friend noticed a bright light in the sky northwest of us.  at first i thought it was a plane and reminded him that we're right by o'hare. as the object descended (in a southeast direction) and was no more than 300 feet above the ground, we were surprised at how far west of ohare it actually was and that it no longer looked like an airplane, although it was difficult to make out what it was because it was so dark out (about 11pm) and our view was obstructed by trees.  as we approached where the object had passed over the highway we were able to see that it was 100 yards away and hovering about 100-150 feet above the ground.

the object had an oval base and looked like a sports stadium (the height was probably about 1/2 of the length of the base so it looked like a sports stadium that had been "smushed" down).  there was an "l" like piece that hung under the bottom and reminded me of what a tv satellite looks like.  the object was light colored (maybe tan or beige) and there were a bunch of thin "l" shaped rods that came off of the sides and pointed upwards with blinking lights on them.  i could not believe how close it was and how clearly i was able to see the "l" shaped rods because they were not very thick.  i dont remember if there were lights on the actual object itself, but the object was lit well enough that it stood out and was so clear that other cars on the road must have noticed it as they passed by too.

we were in such disbelief that what we first thought was a plane on its way to ohare ended up being a ufo that we didnt feel scared, we just kept asking each other if the other person was seeing it too.  i'm not really sure ive fully grasped or comprehended how real what i just saw was and what it means.
content.summary: Stadium-like ufo seen hovering next to highway near o'hare airport

content.detailedDescription: Was looking up at stars, noticed an orange-yellow light. at first thought it was satilite. object grew very bright than vanished. a few minutes later, a second light (white) follewed same path. this light repeated the brightness pattern then, dimmed and continued across the sky. moments later a third dimmer orange light, same path again. this light did not brighten. afterward, two bright orange objects lower in the sky (possibly military planes) seem to follow after. these planes had no becon lights, if they were planes. finally, another light followed first path. this time certain it was satilite though.
content.summary: Seen orange- yellow light, light brightened then vanished. followed by white light, same path same change in brightness.

content.detailedDescription: We were sititng in our backyard looking at the stars. we saw a bright roundish object whos color seemed to brighten and darken as it flew. it was starlike but moving to fast to be a shooting star. was moving very fast through the night sky. seemed to hover over our house before it flashed into disaperance. we were both really schocked and spent quite a bit of time trying to rationlize what the object could be.
content.summary: Bright light over house

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting outside around 10:00pm.  had been watching a video on my laptop.  after watching the video i was turning off my computer.  while the computer shut down i looked up at the sky, which is something i normally do, just to stare at the stars.  i saw a reddish-orange object flying from the southern horizon.  at first i thought the object was just an airplane, they fly over all the time.  as i watched i noticed there were no green/red flashing lights like an airplane or helicopter would have.  the object flew from the south to the north, directly overhead.  there was never any sound.  i grabbed by cell phone and tried to record the object but i must not have hit the record button.  i'm not sure i would have caught anything anyway, as i never could see the object on the screen.

after the object disappeared in the north i was quite shaken up.  i noticed airplanes flying overhead.  i kept staring up in the sky when another object appeared from behind me, as i was facing north.  this one was also reddish orange in color.  this one was either lower or larger as it seemed to have a shape to it.  it was a circle and appeared like i was looking at it through an out of focus camera or telescope.  the second object followed the exact same path as the first.

i thought i might have been watching something like the space station so i checked the nasa tracking website and determined that it had flown over earlier, but in a northwest to southeast direction, so it couldn't have been that.  even if it had been the iss it wouldn't have explained seeing two different objects, unless there had been another spacecraft like a soyuz that was following the iss.  needless to say i'm pretty freaked out about the experience.  personally, i'd prefer a logical explanation, rather than not knowing what i saw.
content.summary: Two reddish-orange lights fly across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the front porch talking to my spouse when a light in the sky caught my eye. i looked directly at it thinking perhaps it was some type of fireworks, but it just sat there hovering. then another just seemed to appear not far from the 1st. i asked my spouse what those lights in the sky were when i noticed a 3rd light. jokingly i asked if it was the mother ship coming in when i noticed the 4th light. my spouse began questioning if it was some type of weird fireworks bc they all seemed to be moving, yet stationary. they were just hovering there in the sky. we walked out into the street to get a better view of all 4 lights as the last 2 were somewhat obstructed from view by trees. the lights continued to hover, but seemed to move from a pointed v formation to a flat v formation. we continued to question each other what they could be and why they would just be hovering in place, and why the v formation? i kept telling my spouse that it was crazy how they looked like fireballs, or stars that were really close and on fire. they glowed and flickered a reddish, yellowish orange glow. then the in the opposite order that they appeared they faded out. at first it appeared the 3rd and 4th fireballs were ascending toward the north, but i couldn't be sure if they were really ascending or if they just fizzled out. then the 2nd fireball appeared to be getting smaller. then the 1st one appeared to be fizzling out. it appeared to have an afterglow that lingered in the sky. again, i couldn't be sure if they ascended, burnt out or fizzled out. the 1st one i saw appeared to be the biggest and brightest of all 4 objects. each one the appeared, appeared to be smaller than the one before it. once they all disappeared i continued to stare into the sky. then began looking all around in the sky. behind me i noticed an airplane flying northeast. i was so bewildered, curious, a little unnerved and awestruck all at the same time. and i keep going back out to look at the sky. and i watched the news to see if they reported anything about it. nothing. :(
content.summary: 2 large fireballs hovering then 2 more appeared 1 at a time moved to a v formation; flickering then faded out 1 at a time

content.detailedDescription:
On may 27, 2012, about 9:34 pm eastern time, a group of us were watching a movie.  as we were sitting on the couch, i saw a light through the blinds out of the corner of my eye.  at first i thought it may be lights from an air plane.  however, i noticed it was very bright, very low and moving at a slow pace.  i jumped up from my seat and startled everyone by rushing to the window.  when i looked through blinds i saw an orange-red orb with a bright white light floating by over the treetop in the neighboring home's yard.  one of the group pulled the blinds open and we were shocked at what we saw.  we immediately rushed outside and saw the object passing by.  

as it moved it was rising into the air in the northeast direction towards philadelphia northeast 
airport.  there were no other craft in the air, and no one was around.  there was no wind and there was over-cast.  the object was way below cloud level even as it was ascending.  it kept on a straight line path and was rising higher into the air.  as it passed over the houses across the street it seemed to pick up speed.  

the event lasted all of 5 minutes before it floated away, into the clouds, past our line of sight over the houses.  4 of us witnessed something that it seemed no one else was around to see.  there was no sound, or residual affect from it.  not something that could be mistaken for what we saw.  this is the second sighting, of two different sightings in this area.  i personally didn't witness the first and this is the first ever in my life.  if anyone witnessed this event respond to the post or leave a description on this sight. 

we are very interested in knowing if anyone else out there saw what we saw tonight.  cause it was f'n freaky!!!!
content.summary: Northeast philadelphia single orb sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work, it was at 9:14 pm..I was just cruzing along and i noticed a really bright light just south east of the moon. it was just above the horizon and intirally to big to be a star. so i took out my cell phone and recorded a video of the object..I was not forsure what it was cause ive never seen it on my drive home like that before. ive been looking for it at the same time everynight since and its not there ! idk, im lost on what i saw and have recorded ! in the video you can clearly seee the moon. the camera im using is not very good plus im driving trying to record the object if you pause the video at 1 second look to the right of the moon just on the horizon you can see the object clearly !
content.summary: Driving home i took video of the object i seen

content.summary: Driving home i took video of the object i seen

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i just got out of our car at our apartment complex after an early evening of fishing tonight 5/27/12. she got out of the car first. this was about 9:30pm central. she hurriedly told me to get out of the car. i thought something was wrong so i got out and she said to look up and i saw a star-like object in the sky moving twice as fast as a plane would be. we see planes all the time. this was not in our atmosphere. it was white and moved in one direction to the southeast above our heads. we waited and watched till it was out of our view. i don't know exactly what that was but it was great experiencing it because of how high it was and how fast it was moving. it didn't blink. it was like seeing a star that just moved really fast in the sky. it was too high to be a plane and too fast to be a plane.
content.summary: Star-like object at night moving twice as fast as a plane

content.detailedDescription: Outside with a friend and noticed a star like object moving the speed of a plane. it had no blinking lights and no sound. it then turned into a bright blue light then back to its original star like color and kept at a steady speed as it gradually ascended out of sight but before it lost visibility it then turned to a bright yellow light. then, gone. totally blew our minds.
content.summary: Star like object moving with no sound, changed colors twice.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were headed southbound on butterfield road when at around the stoplight at allanson road my husband said"what are those planes doing?? " there was a stream of red orbs all in a line heading west. they were in groups of 4 and then 2 and 3.  i said, "oh they must be in a holding pattern for the airport and can't land". my husband said "the airport is way way too far south of here for anything like that and some of them are following very close together". i then noticed & said oh my gosh your right. looked closer and begged husband to pull over so we could get a better look and i could videotape with my cell phone.  he said there was no where to pull over so i opened window and tried to tape what we were witnessing.  i was terrified at this point and couldn't understand what they were. we stopped momentarily at railroad crossing and i looked out and up and there were two of these red glowing orbs directly above our car. i could see them clear as could be but couldn't make out any details.  they were silent, no engine, no noise at all.  they were not chinese lanterns and they were not flickering as such, they were just glowing and kind of like pulsating. they were not airplanes or any type of helicopter or drone. they were large red glowing spheres.  we crossed the tracks and went to the parking lot across the street and by this time they had gone so far i could only see one in the far distance which i believe to mean they were obviously traveling at a high speed of around 500 mph. i tried from the lot to videotape with my phone the remaining glowing red orb and didn't think i was picking anything up so stopped quickly but at home realized i did get a shot of it very briefly & i have saved it as a photo. i have video of 20 seconds of this event but unfortunately it is not great because i was doing it out the window of a moving vehicle. i was very much affected by this event and am still shook up over it. i have never ruled ufo or other life out but now that i have witnessed such an unexplainable event i feel i have witnessed something  i will never forget as long as i live. it was upsetting, creepy and disturbing and i had almost wished i hadn't seen it. again, i apologize for the poor video quality but i am glad i got anything at all. in it you can see three of these moving red glowing orbs.
content.summary: 7-10 glowing red orbs traveling across sky going east to west

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog, out of corner of my eye say it flying above the house in the sky appx 2-400 feet high. dumbbell shaped object. two balls or orbs glowing red/ink connected by a very short unliit walkway or platform. straight flight path. i was in awe and my dog actually sat down and watched it with me. it made a low beep/humming sound followed by what sounded like a squeek, like a hinge needing oil. beep...Beep...Beep...Beep...Beep...Squeak. repeated constantly, as though it were coming from the object itself from in the air. object continued on it's path and went over the trees and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Two orbs colored redish-pink connected by some kind of short unlit walkway. dumbbell shaped almost, slow moving.

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog, out of corner of my eye say it flying above the house in the sky appx 2-400 feet high. dumbbell shaped object. two balls or orbs glowing red/ink connected by a very short unliit walkway or platform. straight flight path. i was in awe and my dog actually sat down and watched it with me. it made a low beep/humming sound followed by what sounded like a squeek, like a hinge needing oil. beep...Beep...Beep...Beep...Beep...Squeak. repeated constantly, as though it were coming from the object itself from in the air. object continued on it's path and went over the trees and i lost sight of it.

content.detailedDescription: Flourescent glowing orb flew across sky at around 10:30pm over interstate 10 in the area west of blythe ca.I was driving a truck eastbound at that time. it appeared to descend at a shallow .Angle and then dissapeared without coming to ground. must have been witnessed by many on interstate 10 at that time. i thought it may be a flare but it left no trail
content.summary: Flourescent orb flying across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was up at about 11:30 pm to get a glass of water. i live in sherwood park, alberta. i put some ice in the water and went to my south facing windows to have a look outside. i started to check out the stars. it was a clear night.

just then i saw a brilliant gigantic photoflash in the sky over the camrose area. it was so bright i was startled. i continued watching to see if it would flash again, but nothing happened.

i was about to go back to bed, when suddenly i saw an orange orb flying through the sky. it was coming from the direction of ferintosh. i grabbed my camcorder and started taking video. it was bright. brighter than the stars. i continued watching as i realized it was not a satellite, flying a slightly arced path from se to nw.

it passed to the east of sherwood park, probably over toefield and i lost sight of it behing my house roof line. i ran to my front door(facing north) and picked it up again, headed to ft. saskatchewan or st. albert, where it suddenly stopped. i got tired of watching it and went to bed. i got up a few times more and checked on it. it stayed there all night.

i played the video only to find that my camera recorded nothing. not even the stars.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Video of glowing orb crossing sky

content.detailedDescription: I was flying in a small plane. saw object to left side. thought it was another plane or blimp. realised it was motionless and not quite a blimp shape. quickly photographed with cellphone. i will answer questions from mufon investigators.
content.summary: Saw object motionless in sky from plane and photographed.

content.detailedDescription: While standing outside on a clear night (may 27, 2012 at about 12:35am), my girlfriend and i both witnessed what appeared to be a satellite or commercial airliner at very high altitude - approximately 25,000 feet.  what distinguished this single bright star-like light such that we knew it was not a conventional craft was that it went all the way from the western horizon to the eastern horizon in only about 8 seconds (flying in a straight line).  we were astounded by the speed of the craft.  once it passed out of view it did not return.  so far (about 9 hours later), we have had no unusual experiences as a result of this sighting.
content.summary: What looked like a satellite at about 25,000 feet traveled across the entire sky in only 8 seconds!
